title: Triumph for 7-0 Cougars
text: Posted: 10/20/2015 06:45:18 PM MDT Updated: 10/20/2015 06:49:27 PM MDT Quarterback Trey Walters rushes for a touchdown during Friday s away game (Courtesy photo) The undefeated Cougars claimed victory over the Caliche Buffalo's on Friday, October 16. They have a 7-0 record now, with only two regular season games left. Holding the Buffalo's to a no point game the Cougars defeated them 52-0. This Friday, Oct. 23 the No. 2 ranked SCC Cougars take on the No. 1 ranked Daysprings Christian in Julesburg with kickoff at 7:00 p.m. An important game for the Cougars so make sure to head to the football field and support these determined young players. This is also parent's night for the football boys and their last home game. Luis Lopez pushes his way through the Caliche defense for a two point conversion after a touchdown by Cole McKinley. (Courtesy photo) Advertisement
